subject: Software don’t renilknizs
description_text:
Hello, the Pro X Ultra pedal does not work. I installed it and did the
initial configuration. After 10 minutes of testing, I turned off the PC to
do other things. When I returned, it did not work! The application is
blocked! The SIM Manager is not blocked. IRacing does not recognize the
pedal, and the SIM Messenger software is blocked, without the possibility
of moving or configuring it. I uninstalled it and reinstalled it. I tried
this process throughout the day and it did not work. I have a championship
on Sunday and I would like to use the Prodigy! I would like to know if you
have any explanation and how to make it work?

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 3986 中
